text:
brainbot technologies AG | Blockchain Development | Mainz, Germany; Berlin, Germany; Munich, Germany | On-site brainbot technologies is a blockchain development studio, creating the core building blocks to scale the technology towards broad adoption of public blockchain systems. Our projects have been key to the core of Ethereum and continue to be crucial to the adoption and the current development roadmap of Ethereum.
